Warning: /opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH-5.7.1-1.cdh5.7.1.p1685.1641/bin/../lib/sqoop/../accumulo does not exist! Accumulo imports will fail.
Please set $ACCUMULO_HOME to the root of your Accumulo installation.
